name: Try Not To Have Gay Sex With Yves 2: The Return Of Not Having Gay Sex With Yves
name_original: Try Not To Have Gay Sex With Yves 2: The Return Of Not Having Gay Sex With Yves
description:
Chuu is back, wanting to have gay sex with Yves once again.  Your mission as the player in this fiendishly difficult sequel to 2019's gayest Loona-themed puzzle adventure game is to not let this happen.  Featuring all your Loona faves and a beefy supporting cast, can you find a way to outwit the lesbian force of Chuuves or will you die have gay sex trying?

Content warning: while no gay sex is depicted via graphics or text in this game, Chuu does talk about wanting gay sex a hell of a lot, probably even more than you're expecting.  This game also contains adult concepts, swearing, a highly problematic reference to r*pe, and some really bad piano playing, so please be forewarned.

There's probably a few bugs but who cares.

Comments and feedback go here: https://kpopalypse.com/2020/07/18/try-not-to-have-gay-sex-with-yves-2-the-return...

This game, as well as all Kpopalypse content, is completely FREE to access and always will be, so don't ever let some cunt charge you for this crap.  However if you would like to show your support and ensure that more of this fucking dogshit comes out in the future, please consider supporting Kpopalypse at Patreon.
